87386.en:
<pc> released Clucky near Sunbeam Square's
well!
87386.ja:
<pc>は　こもれびの広場の井戸の周りで
コッケちゃんを　解き放った！
87386.ko:
{pc}|hpp(은,는) 햇살 광장의 우물 주위에
꼬꼬를 풀어놓았다!
87386.zh-Hans:
<pc>在林荫广场的井附近
把咯咯哒放了出来！
87386.zh-Hant:
<pc>到林隙日光廣場的水井附近
釋放了咕咕！

57823.ja: <voice 00480_00057823><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「キャハハハハッ！！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57823.zh-Hans: <voice 00480_00057823><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哈哈哈哈哈哈！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57823.zh-Hant: <voice 00480_00057823><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哇哈哈哈哈！！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57824.en:
<voice 00685_00057824><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Even if the wheat withers, and you run out of tears
to shed...<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57824.ja:
<voice 00685_00057824><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「たとえ　すべての麦を倒し
　水が干上がり　涙が枯れても……<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57824.ko:
<voice 00685_00057824><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 설령 모든 밀을 쓰러뜨리고
　물이 바닥나고 눈물이 말라붙어도……<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57824.zh-Hans:
<voice 00685_00057824><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>就算所有麦子都倒下来，
水源和泪水全都枯竭了……<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57824.zh-Hant:
<voice 00685_00057824><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>就算所有麥子都倒下來，
水源和淚水全都枯竭了……<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57825.en:
<voice 00870_00057825><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Melsandy Village's ruin comes hither, and my grudge
won't end.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57825.ja:
<voice 00870_00057825><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「メルサンディ村が　滅びぬ限り
　私の恨みは　止まらない。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57825.ko:
<voice 00870_00057825><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 메르상디 마을이 멸망하지 않는 한
　나의 원한은 멈추지 않아.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57825.zh-Hans:
<voice 00870_00057825><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>只要梅尔桑蒂村不毁灭，
我的恨就无法消除。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57825.zh-Hant:
<voice 00870_00057825><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>梅爾桑蒂村還存在一天，
我的憎恨就不會消失。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57826.en: <voice 01060_00057826><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>...With the eternal night came the Witch, Gretzel <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57826.ja:
<voice 01060_00057826><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「……永遠の夜とともに
　魔女グレイツェル　参りました<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57826.ko:
<voice 01060_00057826><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: ……영원한 밤과 함께
　마녀 그레이첼 등장<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57826.zh-Hans:
<voice 01060_00057826><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……魔女格雷策尔和
永远的黑夜一起登场了<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57826.zh-Hant:
<voice 01060_00057826><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……魔女格蕾潔爾
和永遠的黑夜一起登場了<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57827.ja: <voice 01180_00057827><start_lip_sync n02221 _normal m00001>「コケコッコーーーーー！<stop_lip_animation n02221 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57827.zh-Hant: <voice 01180_00057827><start_lip_sync n02221 _normal m00001>咕嘰咕咕～～！！<stop_lip_animation n02221 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57828.ja: <voice 01380_00057828><start_lip_sync n02221 _normal m00001>「コケコッコーーーーー！！<stop_lip_animation n02221 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57828.zh-Hant: <voice 01380_00057828><start_lip_sync n02221 _normal m00001>咕嘰咕咕～～！！<stop_lip_animation n02221 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57829.ja: <voice 01525_00057829><start_lip_sync n02221 _normal m00001>「コケコッコーーーーー！！！<stop_lip_animation n02221 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57829.zh-Hant: <voice 01525_00057829><start_lip_sync n02221 _normal m00001>咕嘰咕咕～～！！<stop_lip_animation n02221 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57830.ja: <voice 01725_00057830><start_lip_sync n02221 _normal m00001>「コ　コケ……。<stop_lip_animation n02221 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57830.ko: <voice 01725_00057830><start_lip_sync n02221 _normal m00001>: 꼬, 꼬끼…….<stop_lip_animation n02221 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57831.en:
<voice 01855_00057831><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Hehe... <heart> Looks like you thought that my weakness
was chickens, didn't you.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57831.ja:
<voice 01855_00057831><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「フフ……<heart>
　私の弱点が　ニワトリだって
　思ったみたいね。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57831.ko:
<voice 01855_00057831><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 후후……<heart>
　내 약점이 닭이라고
　생각한 모양이구나.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57831.zh-Hans:
<voice 01855_00057831><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>呵呵……<heart>
看来有人认为我的弱点
是梅尔桑鸡啊。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57831.zh-Hant:
<voice 01855_00057831><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>呵呵……<heart>
你好像以為我的弱點
是雞啊？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57832.en:
<voice 02015_00057832><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Come to think of it... Has the sound of a chicken ever
made me run away before?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57832.ja:
<voice 02015_00057832><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「そういえば　前に　ニワトリの声を聞いて
　逃げたことがあったかしら？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57832.ko:
<voice 02015_00057832><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 가만, 예전에 닭 울음소리를 듣고
　도망친 적이 있었는데?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57832.zh-Hans:
<voice 02015_00057832><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>这么说起来，我之前好像
听到梅尔桑鸡的叫声就逃跑了？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57832.zh-Hant:
<voice 02015_00057832><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>說起來，我之前好像
有聽到雞叫就逃走過？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57833.en:
<voice 02285_00057833><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>How veeexing... I ran away because I can't stand that
morning light <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57833.ja:
<voice 02285_00057833><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「ざんね～ん……。
　逃げたのは　朝の光が　苦手だからッ<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57833.ko:
<voice 02285_00057833><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 안타까워라…….
　도망친 건 아침 햇살이 싫어서였어<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57833.zh-Hans:
<voice 02285_00057833><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>真～遗憾……
我逃走是因为害怕早上的阳光<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57833.zh-Hant:
<voice 02285_00057833><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>不過很遺憾……
我是因為害怕早晨的太陽逃走的<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57834.en:
<voice 02365_00057834><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>But, now, with magic I call black clouds, so my
weakness is of no concern.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57834.ja:
<voice 02365_00057834><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「でも　今は　魔法で　黒い雲を呼んでるし
　弱点でも　なんでもないのだけど。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57834.ko:
<voice 02365_00057834><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 하지만 지금은 마법으로 먹구름도 불렀으니
　약점이고 뭐고 아무것도 없지만 말이야.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57834.zh-Hans:
<voice 02365_00057834><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>但是我今天已经用魔法招来乌云了。
已经没有什么所谓的弱点了。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57834.zh-Hant:
<voice 02365_00057834><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>不過我已用魔法呼喚了黑雲，
已經沒有什麼好讓我害怕的東西了。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57835.en: <voice 02470_00057835><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Hey, travelers <heart> You want to be bread, too?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57835.ja:
<voice 02470_00057835><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「ねえ　旅人さん<heart>
　あなたも　パンになっちゃう？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57835.ko:
<voice 02470_00057835><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 여행자님<heart>
　당신도 빵이 되어 볼래?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57835.zh-Hans:
<voice 02470_00057835><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>喂，旅行者<heart>
你也想变成面包吗？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57835.zh-Hant:
<voice 02470_00057835><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>旅人<heart>
你也想變成麵包嗎？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57836.en: <voice 02680_00057836><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>YOU'RE the one who's gonna be toast, got it.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57836.ja:
<voice 02680_00057836><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「パンのように　焼きあがるのは
　テメーのほうだぜ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57836.ko:
<voice 02680_00057836><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 빵처럼 구워질 사람은
　바로 너다.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57836.zh-Hans:
<voice 02680_00057836><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>像面包一样
被烤熟的人是你。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57836.zh-Hant:
<voice 02680_00057836><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>像麵包一樣被烤熟的，
是妳才對。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57837.en:
<voice 02911_00057837><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>I don't know what your problem with me is, but stay
away from the village!<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57837.ja:
<voice 02911_00057837><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「俺に　なんの恨みがあるか知らねえが
　これ以上　村に手を出すな。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57837.ko:
<voice 02911_00057837><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 나한테 무슨 원한이 있는지 모르겠지만
　더는 마을을 건드리지 마라.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57837.zh-Hans:
<voice 02911_00057837><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我不知道你和我有什么仇，
但是我不允许你再危害村子。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57837.zh-Hant:
<voice 02911_00057837><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我不知道妳對我有什麼仇，
但我不會讓妳繼續殘害村子。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57838.en: <voice 02926_00057838><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Ah, I wanted to see you, Zanky! <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57838.ja:
<voice 02926_00057838><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「あらん　会いたかったわ。
　ザンクローネッ<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57838.ko:
<voice 02926_00057838><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 어머나, 보고 싶었어.
　장크로네<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57838.zh-Hans:
<voice 02926_00057838><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哎呀，我好想你啊。
赞库罗尼<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57838.zh-Hant:
<voice 02926_00057838><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哎呀，我很想你呢。
桑克朗<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57839.en:
<voice 03061_00057839><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>You dismembered my body and, above all, used them to
attack the village. I can feel the fury in my gut, got it.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57839.ja:
<voice 03061_00057839><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>「あんたは　俺の身体をバラバラにした上
　その身体を使って　俺の村を襲いやがった。
　怒りで　ハラワタが焦げそうだぜ。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57839.ko:
<voice 03061_00057839><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>: 넌 내 몸을 조각조각 해체한 것도 모자라
　그 몸을 써서 우리 마을을 습격했지.
　화가 나서 속이 부글부글 타는군.<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57839.zh-Hans:
<voice 03061_00057839><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>你不仅把我的身体弄得四分五裂，
还用我的身体袭击了村子。
你气得我五脏六腑都要冒烟了。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57839.zh-Hant:
<voice 03061_00057839><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>妳不但將我的身體分散到四處，
還用我的身體襲擊村莊。
我滿腔的怒火都要烤熟五臟六腑了。<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57840.en:
<voice 03156_00057840><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Oh nooo. To think that you're blaming me for your own
sins...<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57840.ja:
<voice 03156_00057840><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「いやあね。自分の罪を　棚に上げて
　私を　責めるなんて……<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57840.ko:
<voice 03156_00057840><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 너무하네. 자기 죄는 나 몰라라 하고
　나를 탓하다니……<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57840.zh-Hans:
<voice 03156_00057840><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>真是的。对自己犯下的过错只字不提，
只是责怪我一个人……<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57840.zh-Hant:
<voice 03156_00057840><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>哎呀，竟然對自己的罪過隻字不提，
反過來指責我……<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57841.en: <voice 03297_00057841><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Really, in body and soul, you are a tiny man <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57841.ja: <voice 03297_00057841><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「ホント　身も心も　ちっちゃいオトコ<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57841.ko: <voice 03297_00057841><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 정말 몸도 마음도 쪼끄만 남자네<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57841.zh-Hans: <voice 03297_00057841><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>真是个身体和心眼一样小的男人<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57841.zh-Hant: <voice 03297_00057841><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>還真是個身體、器量都很小的男人呢<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57842.zh-Hans: <voice 03699_00057842><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>我犯下的……过错？<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57842.zh-Hant: <voice 03699_00057842><start_lip_sync n02001 _normal m00001>……你說……罪過？<stop_lip_animation n02001 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57843.en:
<voice 03989_00057843><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Your sins will destroy Melsandy Village. Great Mr.
Hero, won't they <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57843.ja:
<voice 03989_00057843><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「あなたの　罪のせいで
　メルサンディ村は　滅んじゃうのよ。
　たいした英雄さんね<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57843.ko:
<voice 03989_00057843><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 당신의 죄 때문에
　메르상디 마을은 멸망할 거야.
　참 대단하신 영웅님이네<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57843.zh-Hans:
<voice 03989_00057843><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>都是因为你犯下的过错，
梅尔桑蒂村才要毁灭的。
了不起的大英雄<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57843.zh-Hant:
<voice 03989_00057843><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>都是因為你犯下的罪過，
梅爾桑蒂村才要毀滅的。
真是個了不起的英雄啊<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57844.en:
<voice 04359_00057844><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Come and see me again, okay, Zanky. As often as you
like... <heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57844.ja:
<voice 04359_00057844><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「また　会いにきてね　ザンクローネ。
　何度でも　会いにきて……<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57844.ko:
<voice 04359_00057844><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 또 만나러 와, 장크로네.
　몇 번이고 만나러 와 줘……<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57844.zh-Hans:
<voice 04359_00057844><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>下次再来找我吧，赞库罗尼。
不管几次，你都要来找我啊……<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57844.zh-Hant:
<voice 04359_00057844><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>要再來找我喔，桑克朗。
要來找我幾次都沒有問題……<heart><stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57845.en:
<voice 04660_00057845><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>...When that time comes, anything that's dear to you,
I'll splatter.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57845.ja:
<voice 04660_00057845><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「……その時こそ　あなたの大切なものを 
　何もかも　グッチャグチャにしてあげる。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57845.ko:
<voice 04660_00057845><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: ……그때는 반드시 당신에게 소중한 것을
　모조리 엉망진창으로 만들어 주겠어.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57845.zh-Hans:
<voice 04660_00057845><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……等到那个时候，
我就会把你重要的东西全部都毁掉。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57845.zh-Hant:
<voice 04660_00057845><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>……到那時，我會將你重要的東西
全都毀得一乾二淨。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000041.en:
<voice 04790_29000041><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Come now, little girl. How about you run back home
and tell everyone of the destruction and horrors that
await them.<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000041.ja:
<voice 04790_29000041><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「さあ　お嬢さん。お家に帰って
　滅びの恐怖を　伝えてくれるかしら。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000041.ko:
<voice 04790_29000041><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 자, 아가씨. 집으로 돌아가서
　멸망의 공포를 전해 줄래?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000041.zh-Hans:
<voice 04790_29000041><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>好啦，小姐，就请你回家去
传达毁灭的恐惧吧。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000041.zh-Hant:
<voice 04790_29000041><start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>好啦，小姐，就請妳回家去
傳達毀滅的恐懼吧。<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
